The Yangshita No.1 Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Narisong, Ordos City, Inner Mongolia

operators: Inner Mongolia Huineng Coal and Electricity Group Yangshita Coal Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Inner Mongolia Huineng Coal and Electricity Group and owned by Beijing Huayuan Jiaxin Investment Company.
